title: Emerald Blossom Vanki Bangle - Signature Collection
features: Intricately handcrafted openwork filigree design inspired by nature, featuring floral motifs and delicate vine patterns. Central focal point is a vibrant emerald cabochon surrounded by a halo of sparkling CZ diamonds. The Vanki design is a traditional South Indian bangle style known for its unique curved shape, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune. Exceptional attention to detail in the setting and finishing.
colors: Warm golden hue of the 22K gold
and brilliant white sparkle of the CZ diamonds. A classic and timeless color combination.
occasions: and special celebrations. Can also be worn as a statement piece for upscale social gatherings and formal events.
description: A unique blend of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The Vanki style is a cherished heirloom piece, and this design incorporates contemporary styling for a timeless appeal. The high-quality craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty. The vibrant emerald and sparkling CZ diamonds create a captivating sparkle. This is a statement piece that reflects both cultural heritage and refined taste. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of regal opulence.
